ops.description: fade({r:0, g:0, b:0, speed:1, type:4, adjust:0});
fade({r:0, g:0, b:0, speed:8, type:1, adjust:255});

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:2}); // {Tifa}
“Where are all the villagers?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:3}); // {Cid}
“God! What the hell happened here!?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:7}); // {Yuffie}
“Oh good, they're still alive.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:8}); // {Cait Sith}
“Oy!
What on earth happened?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:10}); // {Cloud}
“You mean to tell me
we're the only ones who made it?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:11}); // {Tifa}
“I couldn't do anything.
It was just too much.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:12}); // {Cid}
“Damn!!
I can't stand this!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:14}); // {Aeris}
“I…
I couldn't save anyone…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:13}); // {Barret}
“Oh man…
You look like hell.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:16}); // {Yuffie}
“Well, I'm just glad
we're all alive.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:17}); // {Cait Sith}
“Things sure didn't go smoothly.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:18}); // {Vincent}
“We might have underestimated
the situation.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:19}); // {Cloud}
“You mean to tell me
that's the extent of my powers?”{PAUSE}“So that's as good as it gets?
At this rate I'll never beat
the Shinra…let alone Sephiroth…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:22}); // {Aeris}
“{Cloud}…
You won't find the answer
by blaming yourself.”{PAUSE}“Things are the way they are…
But you can't blame yourself
for that, right?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:20}); // {Barret}
“Yeah, ain't no way you gonna win.”{PAUSE}“But if we give up now,
what's gonna happen to Fort Condor?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:21}); // {Tifa}
“No, {Cloud}.
You mustn't give up.
Survivors never give up.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:23}); // {Red XIII}
“Don't be too hard on yourself,
{Cloud}.
Let's think about
what we should do next.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:27}); // {Cid}
“We'll do it next time, OK?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:24}); // {Yuffie}
“No use crying over spilt milk.
Right?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:25}); // {Cait Sith}
“Geez, you don't pull any punches do you?
We'll just try not to fail next time.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:26}); // {Vincent}
“We have to fight to
avoid any more casualties.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:28}); // {Cloud}
“Yeah.”{PAUSE}“They've had their fun,
but it's over as of now!
There isn't gonna be
any more suffering.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:29}); // {Tifa}
“{Cloud}…
What should I do?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:35}); // {Cid}
“Oy, such a bitter pill to swallow.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:32}); // {Yuffie}
“{Cloud}
I wonder what's going to happen?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:33}); // {Cait Sith}
“Y'know, worryin' only tires you out.
Why don't you take it easy?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:34}); // {Vincent}
“You've got no choice
but to take it for now.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:36}); // {Cid}
“This ain't no joke, Jack.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:37}); // {Barret}
“Oh man, this is real bad.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:38}); // {Red XIII}
“Things don't seem too favorable.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:39}); // {Yuffie}
“I told you I'm not kidding!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:40}); // {Cait Sith}
“If this were a joke it'd be one thing,
but this's the truth.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:41}); // {Vincent}
“This is a rather harsh reality.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:42}); // “It's Huge Materia that the Shinra's after…
The only one left is
in the underwater reactor in Junon.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:43}); // {Barret}
“We gotta get there first
and protect it!!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:44}); // {Red XIII}
“We must get there first
and stop them.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:45}); // {Yuffie}
“We got to get there first
and stop them…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:46}); // {Vincent}
“We've got to get there first
and stop them.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:47}); // “Yeah, but since we got in their way
the last time, they should've gotten
a little more cautious.”{PAUSE}“I doubt they'll fly right into action.
I'm more concerned about him
than anything else.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:53}); // {Cid}
“Yeah, and I'm worried that
even {Tifa}'s gonna fall over
on her butt.”{PAUSE}“Let's go back and
see what's happening…
to {CYAN}Mideel{WHITE}…”
climbLadder({x:-17, y:298, z:285, triangleId:2, advanceKey:Key.Up, animationId:4, facingDirection:104, speed:1});
climbLadder({x:4, y:249, z:0, triangleId:0, advanceKey:Key.Down, animationId:4, facingDirection:104, speed:1});
climbLadder({x:-17, y:298, z:285, triangleId:2, advanceKey:Key.Up, animationId:4, facingDirection:104, speed:1});
climbLadder({x:4, y:249, z:0, triangleId:0, advanceKey:Key.Down, animationId:4, facingDirection:104, speed:1});
climbLadder({x:-17, y:298, z:285, triangleId:2, advanceKey:Key.Up, animationId:4, facingDirection:104, speed:1});
climbLadder({x:4, y:249, z:0, triangleId:0, advanceKey:Key.Down, animationId:4, facingDirection:104, speed:1});

dialogStrings:
{Cloud}
“You mean to tell me
we're the only ones who made it?”

{Tifa}
“I couldn't do anything.
It was just too much.”

{Yuffie}
“Well, I'm just glad
we're all alive.”

{Cloud}
“You mean to tell me
that's the extent of my powers?”{PAUSE}“So that's as good as it gets?
At this rate I'll never beat
the Shinra…let alone Sephiroth…”

{Barret}
“Yeah, ain't no way you gonna win.”{PAUSE}“But if we give up now,
what's gonna happen to Fort Condor?”

{Tifa}
“No, {Cloud}.
You mustn't give up.
Survivors never give up.”

{Aeris}
“{Cloud}…
You won't find the answer
by blaming yourself.”{PAUSE}“Things are the way they are…
But you can't blame yourself
for that, right?”

{Red XIII}
“Don't be too hard on yourself,
{Cloud}.
Let's think about
what we should do next.”

{Yuffie}
“No use crying over spilt milk.
Right?”

{Cait Sith}
“Geez, you don't pull any punches do you?
We'll just try not to fail next time.”

{Vincent}
“We have to fight to
avoid any more casualties.”

{Cloud}
“Yeah.”{PAUSE}“They've had their fun,
but it's over as of now!
There isn't gonna be
any more suffering.”

{Yuffie}
“{Cloud}
I wonder what's going to happen?”

{Cait Sith}
“Y'know, worryin' only tires you out.
Why don't you take it easy?”

{Vincent}
“You've got no choice
but to take it for now.”

{Cid}
“Oy, such a bitter pill to swallow.”

{Cait Sith}
“If this were a joke it'd be one thing,
but this's the truth.”

“It's Huge Materia that the Shinra's after…
The only one left is
in the underwater reactor in Junon.”

{Barret}
“We gotta get there first
and protect it!!”

{Red XIII}
“We must get there first
and stop them.”

{Yuffie}
“We got to get there first
and stop them…”

{Vincent}
“We've got to get there first
and stop them.”

“Yeah, but since we got in their way
the last time, they should've gotten
a little more cautious.”{PAUSE}“I doubt they'll fly right into action.
I'm more concerned about him
than anything else.”

{Cid}
“Yeah, and I'm worried that
even {Tifa}'s gonna fall over
on her butt.”{PAUSE}“Let's go back and
see what's happening…
to {CYAN}Mideel{WHITE}…”
